items.content_html: This repository hosts a lightweight web application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to harness the power of the GitHub API. The application enables users to effortlessly explore GitHub user profiles, search for repositories, and access detailed user information.
items.title: SyedMoin-lab/GitHub-Api: This repository hosts a lightweight web application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to harness the power of the GitHub API. The application enables users to effortlessly explore GitHub user profiles, search for repositories, and access detailed user information.
